text: Ya ku waɗanda suka yi imani! Ku kasance mataimakan Allah kamar abin da Isa ɗanMaryama ya ce ga Hawariyawa, "Waɗanne ne mataimakana zuwa ga (aikin) Allah?" Sai wata ƙungiya daga Bani Isra'ila ta yi imani, kuma wata ƙungiya ta kafirta. Sai muka ƙarfafa waɗanda suka yi imani a kan maƙiyansu, saboda haka suka wayi gari marinjaya
